column5: This room has a french style double bed, and a shared hallway bath. There is a sitting area, wardrobe, and a dresser in the room-- lots of antique furniture. A twin size rollaway can be added to the room for a third guest. It has high ceilings and east facing windows. It has a ceiling fan and a key lock on the door. It has wooden blinds to block out the light if you're a late sleeper. We call it the \
column8: Historic Home, Private Room, Walk to UTMB & Strand
